name: Jurassic City Walk
description: A dinosaur got inside the city due to the careless scientific experiment. Its only wish is to destroy and crush everything. Take control of this ancient monster and ruin the whole city!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2GHz Dual-core CPU Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB DirectX 9.0c compatible DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 300 MB available space
